item.title: Bioconductor+CRAN镜像设定
item.description: Select a CRAN Mirror 显示所有的镜像信息: getCRANmirrors(all = FALSE, local.only = FALSE) 选择镜像: ## CRAN mirror chooseCRANmirror(graphics = getOption("menu.graphics"), ind = NULL, useHTTPS = getOption("useHTTPS", TRUE), local.only = FALSE) ## CRAN mirror chooseBioCmirror(graphics = getOption("menu.graphics"), ind = NULL, useHTTPS = getOption("useHTTPS", TRUE), local.only = FALSE) 显示当前BioC_mirr
